room_temperature_setpoint.description: Set point of experimental room in deg. C.

room_humidity_setpoint.description: Set point of experimental room in %RH

temperature_setpoint.description: Temperature setpoint of the assay (if assay has own temp reg). Set to 'variable' for cases like the box with variable temp settings in one session. In this case more detailed temp info should be provided in the Protocol. Set to 'none' for assays without their own temp reg (in this case the room temp specifies the temperature the assay was run at).

humidity_setpoint.description: Humidity setpoint of the assay (if assay has own humidity reg). Set to 'variable' if variable humidity settings in one session. In this case more detailed humidity info should be provided in the Protocol. Set to 'none' for assays without their own humidity reg (in this case the room humidity specifies the temperature the assay was run at).

time_after_lightson.description: Hours after lights on that the experiment is set to take place at. Set to None if there is no setpoint.

count_setpoint.description: Setpoint number of flies in the session.

duration_setpoint.description: Length of the experiment in minutes.

gender.description: The gender or genders of the flies. m=male, f=female, b=both, x=either

stimulus.description: Name from a CV of stimulus options or name of a file that contains detailed information about the stimulus

protocol.description: Name of a protocol that explicitly details the protocol for running the assay, e.g. sequence of stimuli shown (as in box). Experiment details unique to individual assays can be captured here.

frame_rate_setpoint.description: Frame rate setpoint of any video captured.

data_rate.description: Approximate number of megabytes of data captured per second during the experiment.
